name: Pet Shop Redemption
description:
Pet Shop Redemption is a game that you control a chameleon, which tries to escape from a pet shop and seek for redemption and freedom. 

Controls:

"A" - Move Left

"D" - Move Right

"Space" - Jump

"E" - Eat Bug

Tutorial:

Your objective is simple: Escape from the pet shop using platforms that you encounter. But beware, in order to stand on that platform, you need to have the bug with the same color with that platform. For example, in order to stay on the red platform, you need to have at least one red bug. Each bug corresponds to 5 second of staying on that platform. If you do not have bug of that color, you will lose health. After 10 seconds, you will lose all of your health and the pet shop owner will grab you.

Team:

Aleyna Öztürk: 2D Artist

Halil Ömer Korukoğlu: 2D Artist

Kaan Oyman: Programmer

Kemal Çağlar Güler: Programmer

Yağmur Yaşar: 2D Artist

PS:

This is a prototype that only contains one level that only has one level to only show you the basic mechanics of the game. Game will be finished in one month (probably).

We hope you enjoy our game. GLHF :)
